schema.description: ErrorResponse is a message returned on HTTP error.

post.description: Checks AWS EC2 instance ID.

@type.description:
A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized
protocol buffer message. This string must contain at least
one "/" character. The last segment of the URL's path must represent
the fully qualified name of the type (as in
`path/google.protobuf.Duration`). The name should be in a canonical form
(e.g., leading "." is not accepted).

In practice, teams usually precompile into the binary all types that they
expect it to use in the context of Any. However, for URLs which use the
scheme `http`, `https`, or no scheme, one can optionally set up a type
server that maps type URLs to message definitions as follows:

* If no scheme is provided, `https` is assumed.
* An HTTP GET on the URL must yield a [google.protobuf.Type][]
  value in binary format, or produce an error.
* Applications are allowed to cache lookup results based on the
  URL, or have them precompiled into a binary to avoid any
  lookup. Therefore, binary compatibility needs to be preserved
  on changes to types. (Use versioned type names to manage
  breaking changes.)

Note: this functionality is not currently available in the official
protobuf release, and it is not used for type URLs beginning with
type.googleapis.com. As of May 2023, there are no widely used type server
implementations and no plans to implement one.

Schemes other than `http`, `https` (or the empty scheme) might be
used with implementation specific semantics.

post.description: Changes PMM Server settings.

metrics_resolutions.description: MetricsResolutions represents Prometheus exporters metrics resolutions.

hr.description: High resolution. Should have a suffix in JSON: 1s, 1m, 1h.

mr.description: Medium resolution. Should have a suffix in JSON: 1s, 1m, 1h.

lr.description: Low resolution. Should have a suffix in JSON: 1s, 1m, 1h.

data_retention.description: A number of full days for Prometheus and QAN data retention. Should have a suffix in JSON: 2592000s, 43200m, 720h.

aws_partitions.description: A wrapper for a string array. This type allows to distinguish between an empty array and a null value.

stt_check_intervals.description: STTCheckIntervals represents intervals between STT checks.

metrics_resolutions.description: MetricsResolutions represents Prometheus exporters metrics resolutions.

hr.description: High resolution. Should have a suffix in JSON: 1s, 1m, 1h.

mr.description: Medium resolution. Should have a suffix in JSON: 1s, 1m, 1h.

lr.description: Low resolution. Should have a suffix in JSON: 1s, 1m, 1h.

stt_enabled.description: True if Security Threat Tool is enabled.

platform_email.description: Percona Platform user's email, if this PMM instance is linked to the Platform.

stt_check_intervals.description: STTCheckIntervals represents intervals between STT checks.

backup_management_enabled.description: True if Backup Management is enabled.

azurediscover_enabled.description: True if Azure Discover is enabled.

connected_to_platform.title: True if the PMM instance is connected to Platform

enable_access_control.description: True if Access Control is enabled.

default_role_id.description: Default Access Control role ID for new users.

post.description: Checks for available PMM Server updates.

force.description: If false, cached information may be returned.

only_installed_version.description: If true, only installed version will be in response.

installed.description: VersionInfo describes component version, or PMM Server as a whole.

latest.description: VersionInfo describes component version, or PMM Server as a whole.

update_available.description: True if there is a PMM Server update available.

latest_news_url.description: Latest available PMM Server release announcement URL.

post.description: Returns a list of advisors available to the user.

name.description: Machine-readable name (ID) that is used in expression.

items.description: SecurityCheck contains check name and status.

name.description: Machine-readable name (ID) that is used in expression.

enabled.description: True if that check is enabled.

interval.description: SecurityCheckInterval represents possible execution interval values for checks.

post.description: Adds annotation.

parameters.description: AddAnnotationRequest is a params to add new annotation.
parameters.name: body

schema.description: AddAnnotationRequest is a params to add new annotation.

tags.description: Tags are used to filter annotations.

post.description: Adds external service and adds external exporter. It automatically adds a service to inventory, which is running on provided "node_id", then adds an "external exporter" agent to inventory, which is running on provided "runs_on_node_id".

runs_on_node_id.description:
Node identifier on which an external exporter is been running.
runs_on_node_id always should be passed with node_id.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: node_id, node_name, add_node.

node_name.description:
Node name on which a service and node is been running.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: node_id, node_name, add_node.

add_node.description: AddNodeParams holds node params and is used to add new node to inventory while adding new service.

node_name.description: Unique across all Nodes user-defined name.

container_id.description: Container identifier. If specified, must be a unique Docker container identifier.

address.description:
Node and Exporter access address (DNS name or IP).
address always should be passed with add_node.

service_name.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name. Required.

username.description: HTTP basic auth username for collecting metrics.

password.description: HTTP basic auth password for collecting metrics.

scheme.description: Scheme to generate URI to exporter metrics endpoints.

metrics_path.description: Path under which metrics are exposed, used to generate URI.

node_id.description:
Node identifier on which an external service is been running.
node_id always should be passed with runs_on_node_id.

metrics_mode.description:
MetricsMode defines desired metrics mode for agent,
it can be pull, push or auto mode chosen by server.

 - METRICS_MODE_UNSPECIFIED: Auto

service.description: ExternalService represents a generic External service instance.

service_name.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name.

node_id.description: Node identifier where this service instance runs.

external_exporter.description: ExternalExporter runs on any Node type, including Remote Node.

runs_on_node_id.description: Node identifier where this instance runs.

disabled.description: If disabled, metrics from this exporter will not be collected.

username.description: HTTP basic auth username for collecting metrics.

scheme.description: Scheme to generate URI to exporter metrics endpoints.

metrics_path.description: Path under which metrics are exposed, used to generate URI.

push_metrics_enabled.description: True if exporter uses push metrics mode.

post.description: Adds HAProxy service and external exporter. It automatically adds a service to inventory, which is running on the provided "node_id", then adds an "external exporter" agent to the inventory.

node_id.description:
Node identifier on which an external exporter is been running.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: node_id, node_name, add_node.

node_name.description:
Node name on which a service and node is been running.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: node_id, node_name, add_node.

add_node.description: AddNodeParams holds node params and is used to add new node to inventory while adding new service.

node_name.description: Unique across all Nodes user-defined name.

container_id.description: Container identifier. If specified, must be a unique Docker container identifier.

address.description:
Node and Exporter access address (DNS name or IP).
address always should be passed with add_node.

service_name.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name. Required.

username.description: HTTP basic auth username for collecting metrics.

password.description: HTTP basic auth password for collecting metrics.

scheme.description: Scheme to generate URI to exporter metrics endpoints.

metrics_path.description: Path under which metrics are exposed, used to generate URI.

metrics_mode.description:
MetricsMode defines desired metrics mode for agent,
it can be pull, push or auto mode chosen by server.

 - METRICS_MODE_UNSPECIFIED: Auto

service.description: HAProxyService represents a generic HAProxy service instance.

service_name.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name.

node_id.description: Node identifier where this service instance runs.

external_exporter.description: ExternalExporter runs on any Node type, including Remote Node.

runs_on_node_id.description: Node identifier where this instance runs.

disabled.description: If disabled, metrics from this exporter will not be collected.

username.description: HTTP basic auth username for collecting metrics.

scheme.description: Scheme to generate URI to exporter metrics endpoints.

metrics_path.description: Path under which metrics are exposed, used to generate URI.

push_metrics_enabled.description: True if exporter uses push metrics mode.

post.description: Adds MongoDB Service and starts several Agents. It automatically adds a service to inventory, which is running on the provided "node_id", then adds "mongodb_exporter", and "qan_mongodb_profiler" agents with the provided "pmm_agent_id" and other parameters.

node_id.description:
Node identifier on which a service is been running.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: node_id, node_name, add_node.

node_name.description:
Node name on which a service is been running.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: node_id, node_name, add_node.

add_node.description: AddNodeParams holds node params and is used to add new node to inventory while adding new service.

node_name.description: Unique across all Nodes user-defined name.

container_id.description: Container identifier. If specified, must be a unique Docker container identifier.

service_name.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name. Required.

address.description:
Node and Service access address (DNS name or IP).
Address (and port) or socket is required.

port.description:
Service Access port.
Port is required when the address present.

socket.description:
Service Access socket.
Address (and port) or socket is required.

pmm_agent_id.description: The "pmm-agent" identifier which should run agents. Required.

username.description: MongoDB username for exporter and QAN agent access.

password.description: MongoDB password for exporter and QAN agent access.

qan_mongodb_profiler.description: If true, adds qan-mongodb-profiler-agent for provided service.

tls_skip_verify.description: Skip TLS certificate and hostname validation.

max_query_length.description: Limit query length in QAN (default: server-defined; -1: no limit).

metrics_mode.description:
MetricsMode defines desired metrics mode for agent,
it can be pull, push or auto mode chosen by server.

 - METRICS_MODE_UNSPECIFIED: Auto

disable_collectors.description: List of collector names to disable in this exporter.

stats_collections.description: List of collections to get stats from. Can use * .

collections_limit.title:
Collections limit. Only get Databases and collection stats if the total number of collections in the server
is less than this value. 0: no limit

expose_exporter.title: Optionally expose the exporter process on all public interfaces

service.description: MongoDBService represents a generic MongoDB instance.

service_name.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name.

node_id.description: Node identifier where this instance runs.

address.description:
Access address (DNS name or IP).
Address (and port) or socket is required.

port.description:
Access port.
Port is required when the address present.

socket.description:
Access unix socket.
Address (and port) or socket is required.

mongodb_exporter.description: MongoDBExporter runs on Generic or Container Node and exposes MongoDB Service metrics.

pmm_agent_id.description: The pmm-agent identifier which runs this instance.

disabled.description: Desired Agent status: enabled (false) or disabled (true).

username.description: MongoDB username for scraping metrics.

tls_skip_verify.description: Skip TLS certificate and hostname validation.

push_metrics_enabled.description: True if exporter uses push metrics mode.

status.description:
AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - AGENT_STATUS_STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - AGENT_STATUS_RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - AGENT_STATUS_WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - AGENT_STATUS_STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - AGENT_STATUS_DONE: Agent finished.
 - AGENT_STATUS_UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

stats_collections.title: List of colletions to get stats from. Can use *

collections_limit.title:
Collections limit. Only get Databases and collection stats if the total number of collections in the server
is less than this value. 0: no limit

expose_exporter.title: Optionally expose the exporter process on all public interfaces

qan_mongodb_profiler.description: QANMongoDBProfilerAgent runs within pmm-agent and sends MongoDB Query Analytics data to the PMM Server.

pmm_agent_id.description: The pmm-agent identifier which runs this instance.

disabled.description: Desired Agent status: enabled (false) or disabled (true).

username.description: MongoDB username for getting profiler data.

tls_skip_verify.description: Skip TLS certificate and hostname validation.

max_query_length.description: Limit query length in QAN (default: server-defined; -1: no limit).

status.description:
AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - AGENT_STATUS_STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - AGENT_STATUS_RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - AGENT_STATUS_WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - AGENT_STATUS_STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - AGENT_STATUS_DONE: Agent finished.
 - AGENT_STATUS_UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

post.description: Adds MySQL Service and starts several Agents. It automatically adds a service to inventory, which is running on the provided "node_id", then adds "mysqld_exporter", and "qan_mysql_perfschema" agents with the provided "pmm_agent_id" and other parameters.

node_id.description:
Node identifier on which a service is been running.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: node_id, node_name, add_node.

node_name.description:
Node name on which a service is been running.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: node_id, node_name, add_node.

add_node.description: AddNodeParams holds node params and is used to add new node to inventory while adding new service.

node_name.description: Unique across all Nodes user-defined name.

container_id.description: Container identifier. If specified, must be a unique Docker container identifier.

service_name.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name. Required.

address.description:
Node and Service access address (DNS name or IP).
Address (and port) or socket is required.

port.description:
Service Access port.
Port is required when the address present.

socket.description:
Service Access socket.
Address (and port) or socket is required.

pmm_agent_id.description: The "pmm-agent" identifier which should run agents. Required.

username.description: MySQL username for scraping metrics.

qan_mysql_perfschema.description: If true, adds qan-mysql-perfschema-agent for provided service.

qan_mysql_slowlog.description: If true, adds qan-mysql-slowlog-agent for provided service.

disable_comments_parsing.description: Disable parsing comments from queries and showing them in QAN.

max_query_length.description: Limit query length in QAN (default: server-defined; -1: no limit).

max_slowlog_file_size.description:
If qan-mysql-slowlog-agent is added, slowlog file is rotated at this size if > 0.
If zero, server's default value is used.
Use negative value to disable rotation.

tls_skip_verify.description: Skip TLS certificate and hostname validation.

tablestats_group_table_limit.description:
Tablestats group collectors will be disabled if there are more than that number of tables.
If zero, server's default value is used.
Use negative value to disable them.

metrics_mode.description:
MetricsMode defines desired metrics mode for agent,
it can be pull, push or auto mode chosen by server.

 - METRICS_MODE_UNSPECIFIED: Auto

disable_collectors.description: List of collector names to disable in this exporter.

expose_exporter.title: Optionally expose the exporter process on all public interfaces

service.description: MySQLService represents a generic MySQL instance.

service_name.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name.

node_id.description: Node identifier where this instance runs.

address.description:
Access address (DNS name or IP).
Address (and port) or socket is required.

port.description:
Access port.
Port is required when the address present.

socket.description:
Access unix socket.
Address (and port) or socket is required.

mysqld_exporter.description: MySQLdExporter runs on Generic or Container Node and exposes MySQL Service metrics.

pmm_agent_id.description: The pmm-agent identifier which runs this instance.

disabled.description: Desired Agent status: enabled (false) or disabled (true).

username.description: MySQL username for scraping metrics.

tls_skip_verify.description: Skip TLS certificate and hostname validation.

tablestats_group_table_limit.description:
Tablestats group collectors are disabled if there are more than that number of tables.
0 means tablestats group collectors are always enabled (no limit).
Negative value means tablestats group collectors are always disabled.

push_metrics_enabled.description: True if exporter uses push metrics mode.

status.description:
AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - AGENT_STATUS_STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - AGENT_STATUS_RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - AGENT_STATUS_WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - AGENT_STATUS_STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - AGENT_STATUS_DONE: Agent finished.
 - AGENT_STATUS_UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

tablestats_group_disabled.description: True if tablestats group collectors are currently disabled.

expose_exporter.title: Optionally expose the exporter process on all public interfaces

reregister.description: If true, and Node with that name already exist, it will be removed with all dependent Services and Agents.

metrics_mode.description:
MetricsMode defines desired metrics mode for agent,
it can be pull, push or auto mode chosen by server.

runs_on_node_id.description: Node identifier where this instance runs.

connected.description: True if Agent is running and connected to pmm-managed.

token.description: Token represents token for vmagent auth config.

post.description: Adds PostgreSQL Service and starts postgres exporter. It automatically adds a service to inventory, which is running on provided "node_id", then adds "postgres_exporter" with provided "pmm_agent_id" and other parameters.

node_id.description:
Node identifier on which a service is been running.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: node_id, node_name, add_node.

node_name.description:
Node name on which a service is been running.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: node_id, node_name, add_node.

add_node.description: AddNodeParams holds node params and is used to add new node to inventory while adding new service.

node_name.description: Unique across all Nodes user-defined name.

container_id.description: Container identifier. If specified, must be a unique Docker container identifier.

service_name.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name. Required.

address.description:
Node and Service access address (DNS name or IP).
Address (and port) or socket is required.

port.description:
Service Access port.
Port is required when the address present.

socket.description:
Service Access socket.
Address (and port) or socket is required.

pmm_agent_id.description: The "pmm-agent" identifier which should run agents. Required.

username.description: PostgreSQL username for scraping metrics.

qan_postgresql_pgstatements_agent.description: If true, adds qan-postgresql-pgstatements-agent for provided service.

qan_postgresql_pgstatmonitor_agent.description: If true, adds qan-postgresql-pgstatmonitor-agent for provided service.

max_query_length.description: Limit query length in QAN (default: server-defined; -1: no limit).

disable_comments_parsing.description: Disable parsing comments from queries and showing them in QAN.

tls_skip_verify.description: Skip TLS certificate and hostname validation. Uses sslmode=required instead of verify-full.

metrics_mode.description:
MetricsMode defines desired metrics mode for agent,
it can be pull, push or auto mode chosen by server.

 - METRICS_MODE_UNSPECIFIED: Auto

disable_collectors.description: List of collector names to disable in this exporter.

expose_exporter.title: Optionally expose the exporter process on all public interfaces

Access address (DNS name or IP).
Address (and port) or socket is required.

Access port.

socket.description:
Access unix socket.
Address (and port) or socket is required.

post.description: Discovers RDS instances.

items.description: DiscoverRDSInstance models an unique RDS instance for the list of instances returned by Discovery.

address.description: Address used to connect to it.

engine.description: DiscoverRDSEngine describes supported RDS instance engines.

post.description: Enables/disables Security Thread Tool checks or changes their interval by names.

items.description: ChangeSecurityCheckParams specifies a single check parameters.

name.description: The name of the check to change.

interval.description: SecurityCheckInterval represents possible execution interval values for checks.

post.description: Returns the latest check results for a given service.

page_params.description: PageParams represents page request parameters for pagination.

page_size.description: Maximum number of results per page.

index.description: Index of the requested page, starts from 0.

items.description: CheckResult represents the check results for a given service.

severity.description: Severity represents severity level of the check result or alert.

read_more_url.description: URL containing information on how to resolve an issue detected by an STT check.

service_name.description: Name of the monitored service on which the check ran.

service_id.description: ID of the monitored service on which the check ran.

check_name.title: Name of the check that failed

silenced.title: Silence status of the check result

page_totals.description: PageTotals represents total values for pagination.

post.description: Returns a list of checks available to the user.

items.description: SecurityCheck contains check name and status.

name.description: Machine-readable name (ID) that is used in expression.

enabled.description: True if that check is enabled.

interval.description: SecurityCheckInterval represents possible execution interval values for checks.

post.description: Returns a list of services with failed checks and a summary of check results.

items.description: CheckResultSummary is a summary of check results.

emergency_count.description: Number of failed checks for this service with severity level "EMERGENCY".

alert_count.description: Number of failed checks for this service with severity level "ALERT".

critical_count.description: Number of failed checks for this service with severity level "CRITICAL".

error_count.description: Number of failed checks for this service with severity level "ERROR".

warning_count.description: Number of failed checks for this service with severity level "WARNING".

notice_count.description: Number of failed checks for this service with severity level "NOTICE".

info_count.description: Number of failed checks for this service with severity level "INFO".

debug_count.description: Number of failed checks for this service with severity level "DEBUG".

post.description: Executes Security Thread Tool checks and returns when all checks are executed. All available checks will be started if check names aren't specified.

names.description: Names of the checks that should be started.

post.description: Removes a Service along with Agents.

service_id.description:
Service ID or Service Name is required.
Unique randomly generated instance identifier.

service_name.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name.

post.summary: CreateRule creates alerting rule from the given template.

params.description: Rule parameters. All template parameters should be set.

items.description: ParamValue represents a single rule parameter value.

name.description: Machine-readable name (ID) that is used in expression.

severity.description: Severity represents severity level of the check result or alert.

custom_labels.description: All custom labels to add or remove (with empty values) to default labels from template.

items.description: Filter represents a single filter condition.

post.summary: DeleteTemplate deletes existing, previously created via API.
ListTemplates returns a list of all collected alert rule templates.

reload.description: If true, template files will be re-read from disk.

page_params.description: PageParams represents page request parameters for pagination.

page_size.description: Maximum number of results per page.

index.description: Index of the requested page, starts from 0.

items.description: Template represents Alert Template that is used to create Alert Rule.

expr.description: PromQL query expression with templating parameters.

items.description: ParamDefinition represents a single query parameter.

name.description: Machine-readable name (ID) that is used in expression.

unit.description:
ParamUnit represents template parameter unit.

 - PARAM_UNIT_UNSPECIFIED: Invalid, unknown or absent.
 - PARAM_UNIT_PERCENTAGE: %
 - PARAM_UNIT_SECONDS: s

bool.description: BoolParamDefinition represents boolean parameter's default value.

default.description:
BooleanFlag represent a command to set some boolean property to true,
to false, or avoid changing that property.

 - BOOLEAN_FLAG_UNSPECIFIED: Do not change boolean property. Default value.
 - BOOLEAN_FLAG_TRUE: True.
 - BOOLEAN_FLAG_FALSE: False.

float.description: FloatParamDefinition represents float parameter's default value and valid range.

has_default.description: True if default value is set.

default.description: Default value if has_default is true.

has_min.description: True if minimal valid value is set.

min.description: Minimal valid value (inclusive) if has_min is true.

has_max.description: True if maximal valid value is set.

max.description: Maximal valid value (inclusive) if has_max is true.

string.description: StringParamDefinition represents string parameter's default value.

has_default.description: True if default value is set.

default.description: Default value if has_default is true.

severity.description: Severity represents severity level of the check result or alert.

source.description:
TemplateSource defines template source.

 - TEMPLATE_SOURCE_BUILT_IN: Template that is shipped with PMM Server releases.
 - TEMPLATE_SOURCE_SAAS: Template that is downloaded from check.percona.com.
 - TEMPLATE_SOURCE_USER_FILE: Templated loaded from user-suplied file.
 - TEMPLATE_SOURCE_USER_API: Templated created via API.

created_at.description: Template creation time. Empty for built-in and SaaS templates.

yaml.description: YAML template file content. Empty for built-in and SaaS templates.

totals.description: PageTotals represents total values for pagination.

post.summary: UpdateTemplate updates existing template, previously created via API.

remove_files.description: Removes all the backup files associated with artifact if flag is set.

post.summary: ListArtifacts returns a list of all backup artifacts.

items.description: Artifact represents single backup artifact.

vendor.description: Database vendor e.g. PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL.

service_name.description: Service name.

data_model.description: DataModel is a model used for performing a backup.

status.description: BackupStatus shows the current status of execution of backup.

folder.description: Folder to store artifact on a storage.

items.description: Metadata contains extra artifact data like files it consists of, tool specific data, etc.

file_list.description: List of files backup consists of.

items.description: File represents file or folder on a storage.

restore_to.description: Exact time DB can be restored to.

pbm_metadata.description: PbmMetadata contains additional data for pbm cli tools.

name.description: Name of backup in backup tool representation.

post.summary: ListPitrTimeranges list the available MongoDB PITR timeranges in a given backup location

artifact_id.description: Artifact ID represents artifact whose location has PITR timeranges to be retrieved.

start_timestamp.description: start_timestamp is the time of the first event in the PITR chunk.

end_timestamp.description: end_timestamp is the time of the last event in the PITR chunk.

cron_expression.description: How often backup should be run in cron format.

post.description:
Could return the Error message in the details containing specific ErrorCode indicating failure reason:
ERROR_CODE_XTRABACKUP_NOT_INSTALLED - xtrabackup is not installed on the service
ERROR_CODE_INVALID_XTRABACKUP - different versions of xtrabackup and xbcloud
ERROR_CODE_INCOMPATIBLE_XTRABACKUP - xtrabackup is not compatible with MySQL for taking a backup
ERROR_CODE_INCOMPATIBLE_TARGET_MYSQL - target MySQL version is not compatible with the artifact for performing a restore of the backup

get.description: Returns an error when Server components being restarted are not ready yet. Use this API for checking the health of Docker containers and for probing Kubernetes readiness.

schema.description: This probe is available without authentication, so it should not contain any data.

@type.description:
A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized
protocol buffer message. This string must contain at least
one "/" character. The last segment of the URL's path must represent
the fully qualified name of the type (as in
`path/google.protobuf.Duration`). The name should be in a canonical form
(e.g., leading "." is not accepted).

In practice, teams usually precompile into the binary all types that they
expect it to use in the context of Any. However, for URLs which use the
scheme `http`, `https`, or no scheme, one can optionally set up a type
server that maps type URLs to message definitions as follows:

* If no scheme is provided, `https` is assumed.
* An HTTP GET on the URL must yield a [google.protobuf.Type][]
  value in binary format, or produce an error.
* Applications are allowed to cache lookup results based on the
  URL, or have them precompiled into a binary to avoid any
  lookup. Therefore, binary compatibility needs to be preserved
  on changes to types. (Use versioned type names to manage
  breaking changes.)

Note: this functionality is not currently available in the official
protobuf release, and it is not used for type URLs beginning with
type.googleapis.com. As of May 2023, there are no widely used type server
implementations and no plans to implement one.

Schemes other than `http`, `https` (or the empty scheme) might be
used with implementation specific semantics.

get.description: Retrieve user details from PMM server

put.description: Update details of given user in PMM server

post.description: Retrieve user details for all users from PMM server

role_ids.description: List of role IDs assigned to the user.

parameters.description: Dummy parameter for internal testing. Do not use.
parameters.name: dummy

server.description: VersionInfo describes component version, or PMM Server as a whole.

managed.description: VersionInfo describes component version, or PMM Server as a whole.

distribution_method.description: DistributionMethod defines PMM Server distribution method: Docker image, OVF/OVA, or AMI.
